p: After ethics committee approval (1493/12.03.2018), two trials were carried out on barrows at National Research Development Institute for Animal Biology and Nutrition (INCDBNA Balotesti) according to Romania Law 43/2014 for animal care. Two diets were based on corn, millet and soybean meal in the SM group and 60 g/Kg, (50:50, wt/wt) mix of extruded linseed and walnut meal (EL:WM) replaced 14.2% SM in the experimental group (linseed extruded and walnut meal, LEW) ( Table 1).
